footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Geo Traveler | Update Date: 10/05/2022 | Editor: Ultimate Noob#2955

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
Primordial Jade Cutter
is a great stat stick and unconditional ATK  that scales off of Max HP

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Other 5-Stars Options__: Haran Geppaku Futsu, Mistsplitter Reforged, Summit Shaper
__Best 4-Star Options (In order)__: Lion’s Roar, Festering Desire, The Black Sword, Amenoma Kageuchi
__Battery__: Favonius Sword

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge or ATK% |<goblet>  Geo DMG Bonus |<circlet> CRIT Rate/CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Starfell Sword
**2)** Elemental Burst: Wake of Earth
**3)** Normal Attack: Foreign Rockblade

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Lion's Roar will outperform many 5-Star weapons if the passive can be maintained, such as running Xiangling within the comp. The 3-Star weapon Harbinger of Dawn can outperform most 4-Star weapons and some 5-Star weapons but maintaining the passive may prove to be difficult. If 4 piece Thundersoother or Lavawalker passive can be maintained, it is the best option.
